DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim observational study evaluate incidence major hypoglycaemic episode patient type 2 diabetes treat NovoRapid® Soluble Human Insulin normal clinical practice condition .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Patients Using NovoRapid® Soluble Human Insulin Treatment Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Patients type 2 diabetes Treatment Insulin Aspart ( NovoRapid® ) Soluble Human Insulin minimum 3 month maximum 3 year Patients endstage renal failure Patients serious liver disease Patients concomitant malignant disease
